experiment_name: Accessing non-natural reactivity by irradiating nicotinamide-dependent enzymes with light
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:25°C;    reaction_ph:6.5;    reaction_other_conditions:Enzyme (5 mol%), NADP+ (0.4 mol%), 16% isopropyl alcohol, 4% dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO), irradiated with blue LEDs (460 nm), 12 h, 0.038 mmol scale;    reaction_substrate_concentration:30.4 mM
